HeroSection.desc: It is simply about what materials you use and how you learn...

AboutSection.desc: It is a service that provides an educational activities for people who want step up with their english skills based on their actual level. Proven and qualitative educational materials are our hallmark. Feel free to explore!
AboutSection.qualityDesc: Guarantee of good quality of the transferred material, checked by an English native speaker
AboutSection.upToDateDesc: Rapidly developing application with systematic updates and news
AboutSection.ratingDesc: Letting user know what level they are currently at based on their performance
AboutSection.entertainmentDesc: Activities made not only to test yourself but to compete with your friends and have fun together

BenefitsSection.popularity: It is most widely spoken language in the world
BenefitsSection.media: It is a language of the media
BenefitsSection.job: Increase your chances of getting a good job
BenefitsSection.traveling: Travel around the world with no worry of being misunderstood

ActivitiesSection.desc: Take part in a grammar quiz or test your knowladge of vocabulary. In both cases you have access to the notebook widget that allows you to make important notes and then export them in .txt files if needed.

GamesSection.bonus: As a bonus for completing a
GamesSection.desc: After finishing a quiz you will be awarded with availability to sign in into our external games section. You will be able to play the games whose level of difficulty are adjusted to the score you achieved in the quiz.
